data.message: The new video is a brilliant marketing ploy. The new video pisses you off, you start talking about it on social media, mentioning Em has a new album coming out soon. Brilliant. By the way, I am a Trump supporter 1000% and an Eminem fan. He is entitled to his own opinion though, we all don't have to agree but we should respect each other and allow their choices.

replies.message: It's not about him dissing trump. It's the fact that he said fuck you to fans who voted for him. So naturall the fans that did vote for trump (there are millions) feel betrayed by M after the years of investment via time, money and emotion. M shit on all those people and betrayed them.
